text: @SammyMarkle64 you are just as pathetic as the rest of your family. You haven't had any contact with your sister for over 5 years & all of a sudden she marries Prince Harry you come running back saying 'family's. Get lost you piece of joke.

After everything Thomas Markle still can't keep his mouth shut. Talking crap about the royal family and your son-in-law is not going to solve the problem. You have now just made it worse, don't beg your daughter for love. Keep shut and it will all be good.
